channel.title: General Hacking Juicebox Haxoring Make on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hacking Juicebox Haxoring Make on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Juicebox haxoring
item.description: So awhile ago i was cruising the make flickr tags and i noticed the juicebox frame and i thought “i like frames. they are fun.” So i decided to go get some. unfortunantly they were all gone from walmat, or target so i went to the linux-hacker boards and found a dude who was selling some. I bought them right before it was posted to slashdot.
